func1.desc1: Enter the settings page you want to submit to the assistant by clicking on the settings icon in the upper right corner of the chat window.
func1.desc2: Click on the 'Submit to Assistant Market' button in the upper right corner.
func1.title: Submit via LobeChat

func2.desc: If you want to add the assistant to the index, create an entry in the plugins directory using agent-template.json or agent-template-full.json, write a brief description and appropriate tags, and then create a pull request.
func2.title: Submit via Github

search.placeholder: Search assistant name, description or keywords...
